channel.title: How do i add a special attack to my custom added weapon?
channel.description: i want to give my custom weapon a special. if you don't know how then can someone tell me how to give my monster i have made on metasequoia some anims/movement

item.title: How do i add a special attack to my custom added weapon?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I honestly don’t know never went that “custom”

perhaps searching google may be of use not sure. I know you can create custom emotes so that would be similar.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a special attack to my custom added weapon?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:

You can just look for the specid of another spec and use it if you don’t want to design your own spec.
